Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 76th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2019, off Julian Ritchie (LA)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/14/2019, off Richard Wagner (TOR)...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/1/2020 to a 5-year deal worth $9,000,000 per year...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2020, hitting .457 with 3 HR, 20 RBI...
